channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-16101] QTest failure BeeLine escape_comments after HIVE-16045
item.description: HIVE-16045 committed immediately after HIVE-14459, and added two extra lines to the output which is written there with another thread. We should remove these lines before comparing the out file
item.summary: QTest failure BeeLine escape_comments after HIVE-16045

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Patch removes the log lines before diff

kgyrtkirk: Could you review please? Concurrent changes in HIVE-16045 caused the test fail.

Thanks,
Peter

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12855820/HIVE-16101.patch
